full_product_name.product_name: Red Hat Enterprise Linux for Real Time for NFV (v. 7)

notes.note: kernel: triggering AP to send IAPP location updates for stations before the required authentication process has completed can lead to DoS

reference.description: bz#1789927: CVE-2019-5108 kernel: triggering AP to send IAPP location updates for stations before the required authentication process has completed can lead to DoS

remediation.description:
For details on how to apply this update, which includes the changes described in this advisory, refer to:
https://access.redhat.com/articles/11258

note: Updated kernel-rt packages that fix one bug are now available for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.

The kernel-rt packages provide the Real Time Linux Kernel, which enables fine-tuning for systems with extremely high determinism requirements.
This update fixes the following bug:
* kernel-rt: update to the latest RHEL7.8.z source tree (BZ#1868505)
The system must be rebooted for this update to take effect.
